strength.name: Deadlifts
strength.description: Deadlifts are a compound exercise that targets multiple muscle groups including the back, glutes, and hamstrings.

strength.name: Bench Press
strength.description: The bench press is a classic upper body exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

strength.name: Squats
strength.description: Squats are a fundamental lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

strength.name: Pull-Ups
strength.description: Pull-ups are an effective upper body exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders.

strength.name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
strength.description: Incline dumbbell curls target the biceps and provide a great stretch for the muscle.

strength.name: Standing Barbell Curl
strength.description: Standing barbell curls are a classic bicep exercise that targets the biceps brachii.

strength.name: Standing Dumbbell Curl
strength.description: Standing dumbbell curls are a fundamental bicep exercise that targets the biceps brachii.

strength.name: Lying Floor Leg Raise
strength.description: Lying floor leg raises are an effective exercise for targeting the lower abs.

strength.name: Weighted Crunch
strength.description: Weighted crunches are a challenging exercise that targets the upper and middle abs.

strength.name: Sit Up
strength.description: Sit-ups are a classic ab exercise that targets the entire abdominal region.

strength.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
strength.description: Dumbbell lateral raises target the side deltoids, helping to build broader shoulders.

strength.name: Military Press
strength.description: The military press, also known as the overhead press, is a compound exercise that targets the front and side deltoids.

strength.name: Bent Over Low Pulley Rear Delt Fly
strength.description: Bent over low pulley rear delt flies target the rear deltoids, helping to develop balanced shoulder muscles.

strength.name: Hyperextension
strength.description: Hyperextensions target the lower back and glutes, helping to strengthen and tone these muscles.

strength.name: Glute Kick Back
strength.description: Glute kickbacks target the gluteus maximus, helping to shape and strengthen the glutes.

strength.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
strength.description: Barbell hip thrusts are an effective exercise for targeting the glutes, hamstrings, and lower back.

cardiovascular.name: Running
cardiovascular.description: Running is a great cardiovascular exercise that improves endurance and overall cardiovascular health.

cardiovascular.name: Cycling
cardiovascular.description: Cycling is a low-impact cardiovascular exercise that strengthens the legs and improves cardiovascular fitness.

cardiovascular.name: Jump Rope
cardiovascular.description: Jump rope is a high-intensity cardiovascular exercise that improves coordination and agility.

flexibility.name: Yoga
flexibility.description: Yoga is a practice that combines physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation to improve flexibility, strength, and relaxation.

flexibility.name: Stretching Routine
flexibility.description: A stretching routine helps improve flexibility, prevent injury, and relieve muscle tension.

flexibility.name: Pilates
flexibility.description: Pilates is a low-impact exercise method that focuses on strengthening muscles while improving postural alignment and flexibility.
